body: Quit being friends. That girl betrayed you. She is a traitor. Kick her out. Sue her. Post online that she is a backstabbing bitch, whose dream it is to fuck every single ugly(not literally) monkey in the world in a humongous gangbang. Don't let her get a decent husband. And at the very end, find a good guy yourself that can deal with your past(what was done to you). HAPPY END for every human being.  because everyone knows, Backstabbing bitches are no human. They are scum.   T H E   E N D .
